name: Bright (GoranJohn)
description:
We made a game in which you are trapped in a ball that keeps bouncing. So a platformer without control over the jumping. Making for a different dynamic in jumping.

The game is set in a magical, calming world of Bright, a wisp trying to get back into his castle. In order to do so he has to collect other wisps. Can you find them all?

V1.1 -> Lighting is a lot better.
